response.overview: From the 1950s through the early '70s, nothing satisfied America's love of speed, style and tire-burning fun more than the V-8 muscle car. In this collection of the greatest moments from the top-rated Speed Channel series "My Classic Car," host Dennis Gage scours the country to track down the coolest auto shows and the most interesting car connoisseurs, wheeling out some of the greatest Chevy muscle machines ever produced.
response.title: Chevy Muscle Cars
